name: Tumblr Post Form Tweaks
description: Add-on userstyle for Tumblr Text Edit Always Visible by goodbyemidnight. Could theoretically be used as a stand-alone, but was designed to be used as an enhancement.
additional_info: March 2015 - Trying some alterations to make it work and look better. Keeping them indicated with CSS comments just in case they prove necessary to revert. This style contains elements from Luddites Unite! Roll back Tumblr's editor changes by hideheader. The sections in question are marked through comments in the css, and the style was released under a Creative Commons BY-NC-SA license.
